function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low public compliance with mitigation measures","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, higher infection rates, overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Effective public information campaigns, real-time visual policy tools, coordinated efforts to enhance compliance","Technologies":"Real-time visual policy tools, communication technologies for public information campaigns","People":"General public, individuals at risk of contagious diseases","Owner":"Public health officials, government, researchers"},{"Description":"Quality of data on COVID-19","Impact":"Limited accuracy in analysis, potential for misleading conclusions, compromised decision-making","Mitigation":"Thorough data verification, transparency in reporting, cross-referencing with multiple sources","Technologies":"Data verification tools, data analysis software, transparency platforms for reporting","People":"Researchers, public health officials, decision-makers","Owner":"Researchers, public health officials, data analysts"},{"Description":"Social identity affecting compliance with public health advice","Impact":"Differential compliance rates, spread of contagious diseases influenced by social factors","Mitigation":"Understanding social identity factors, targeted public health messaging, community engagement","Technologies":"Social identity analysis tools, targeted communication technologies, community engagement platforms","People":"Social groups, individuals affected by social identity factors","Owner":"Public health officials, community leaders, researchers"}]}
